    • Method Detail

      • init

        public void init(Session session,
                 byte[] V_S,
                 byte[] V_C,
                 byte[] I_S,
                 byte[] I_C)
          throws Exception
        Description copied from class: KeyExchange
        Initializes the key exchange object. The parameters here seem to be specific to the Diffie-Hellman Key exchange specified by RFC 4253, other Key Exchange mechanisms might need other parameters.
        Specified by:
        init in class KeyExchange
        Parameters:
        session - the session object.
        V_S - the server's identification string sent before negotiation
        V_C - the client's identification string sent before negotiation
        I_S - the server's complete SSH_MSG_KEXINIT message.
        I_C - the server's complete SSH_MSG_KEXINIT message.
        Throws:
        Exception
        See Also:
        RFC 4253, 7. Key Exchange, RFC 4253, 8. Diffie-Hellman Key Exchange

      • next

        public boolean next(Buffer _buf)
             throws Exception
        Description copied from class: KeyExchange
        Does the next step in the key exchange algorithm.
        Specified by:
        next in class KeyExchange
        Parameters:
        _buf - the received packet. It will have the same message-type as KeyExchange.getState() returned before.
        Returns:
        false if there was some problem, true if everything was okay.
        Throws:
        Exception

      • getState

        public int getState()
        Description copied from class: KeyExchange
        returns the identifier of the next SSH packet expected, or KeyExchange.STATE_END if the KeyExchange was already successfully finished.
        Specified by:
        getState in class KeyExchange
